Text:
thanks so much for sharing this in full hd! I really hope you can share the rest like this...

and if someone could upload the ost cd that has gone on sale....ooooh that would be amazing!

i first attempted to get this file through FileServe, but the download only went to 400 MB before it stopped and acted like it was completed, so i took that same file, started and stopped this torrent, added the partial 400 MB file, and did a Force Re-Check with uTorrent, then started and completed it :) So here i am about to watch and also will keep seeding for other fans for awhile. Thanks for posting it TGGuy.
